name: Nats

aliases.name: Effect
aliases.comment:
A nats effect

Kind of like Cmd, but will be converted at the last moment to regular Cmd

aliases.name: Sub
aliases.comment:
A nats subscription

Will be converted at the last moment to regular Sub.

values.name: activeRequests
values.comment: List all the active requests
values.type: Nats.State datatype msg -> List.List { sid : String.String, id : String.String, marker : Maybe.Maybe String.String, subject : String.String, inbox : String.String }

values.name: applyEffectAndSub
values.comment:
Update the nats state according to all the Nats.Effect and Nats.Sub gathered
by the app root component, and emit all the necessary Cmd
values.type: Nats.Config datatype portdatatype msg -> Nats.Effect datatype msg -> Nats.Sub datatype msg -> Nats.State datatype msg -> ( Nats.State datatype msg, Platform.Cmd.Cmd msg )

values.name: cancelRequest
values.comment: Cancel an active request, given its marker
values.type: String.String -> Nats.Effect datatype msg

values.name: connect
values.comment:
Open a socket

The socket will be opened as soon as the subscription is active, and until
the subscriptions is removed.

The socket may get closed if a network error occurs, in which case a
'SocketError' event will be sent

After the subscription is removed, the handler will receive a SocketClosed
event.
values.type: Nats.Protocol.ConnectOptions -> Nats.Socket.Socket -> (Nats.Events.SocketEvent -> msg) -> Nats.Sub datatype msg

values.name: customRequest
values.comment: Create a request with custom features
values.type: { marker : String.String, subject : String.String, replyTo : Maybe.Maybe String.String, message : datatype, onTimeout : Nats.Errors.Timeout -> msg, onResponse : Nats.Protocol.Message datatype -> ( Maybe.Maybe msg, Basics.Bool ), timeout : Maybe.Maybe Basics.Int } -> Nats.Effect datatype msg

values.name: groupSubscribe
values.comment:
Subscribe to a subject with a group

If you wish to subscribe on a non-default socket, use Nats.Sub.onSocket
values.type: String.String -> String.String -> (Nats.Protocol.Message datatype -> msg) -> Nats.Sub datatype msg

values.name: init
values.comment: Initialise a new nats state
values.type: Random.Seed -> Time.Posix -> Nats.State datatype msg

values.name: publish
values.comment:
Publish a new message on a given subject

If you wish to send it on a non-default socket, use Nats.Effect.onSocket
values.type: String.String -> datatype -> Nats.Effect datatype msg

values.name: publishRequest
values.comment: Publish a new message on a given subject, with a 'replyTo' attribute
values.type: String.String -> String.String -> datatype -> Nats.Effect datatype msg

values.name: request
values.comment:
Create a request

The timeout is 5s by default
values.type: String.String -> datatype -> (Result.Result Nats.Errors.Timeout datatype -> msg) -> Nats.Effect datatype msg

values.name: requestWithTimeout
values.comment: Create a request with a custom timeout
values.type: Basics.Int -> String.String -> datatype -> (Result.Result Nats.Errors.Timeout datatype -> msg) -> Nats.Effect datatype msg

values.name: subscribe
values.comment:
Subscribe to a subject

If you wish to subscribe on a non-default socket, use Nats.Sub.onSocket
values.type: String.String -> (Nats.Protocol.Message datatype -> msg) -> Nats.Sub datatype msg

values.name: subscriptions
values.comment: Connect the nats internal state to the ports
values.type: Nats.Config datatype portdatatype msg -> Nats.State datatype msg -> Platform.Sub.Sub msg

values.name: track
values.comment: Track a request
values.type: String.String -> Nats.Sub datatype msg

values.name: update
values.comment: Handle Nats Msg
values.type: Nats.Config datatype portdatatype msg -> Nats.Msg datatype msg -> Nats.State datatype msg -> ( Nats.State datatype msg, Platform.Cmd.Cmd msg )

values.name: withInboxPrefix
values.comment: Set a custom inbox prefix
values.type: String.String -> Nats.State datatype msg -> Nats.State datatype msg

values.name: withMarker
values.comment:
Add a marker on a request

If the effect is not a request, the function is no-op
values.type: String.String -> Nats.Effect datatype msg -> Nats.Effect datatype msg

name: Nats.Config
comment:
Define the configuration for NATS

@docs bytes, bytesPorts, string, withDebug

values.name: bytes
values.comment:
Create a NATS configuration for bytes messages

The binary contents will be base64 encoded/decoded for passing through the ports
values.type: (Nats.Msg Bytes.Bytes msg -> msg) -> Nats.PortsAPI.Ports String.String (Nats.Msg Bytes.Bytes msg) -> Nats.Config Bytes.Bytes String.String msg

values.name: bytesPorts
values.comment:
Create a NATS configuration for bytes messages through ports supporting
the Bytes type.

The binary contents will be passed as is through the ports.
Currently the only known compiler supporting this is the Lamdera compiler, which
requires the dependency "lamdera/codecs" to be added to your project.
values.type: (Nats.Msg Bytes.Bytes msg -> msg) -> Nats.PortsAPI.Ports Bytes.Bytes (Nats.Msg Bytes.Bytes msg) -> Nats.Config Bytes.Bytes Bytes.Bytes msg

values.name: string
values.comment:
Create a NATS configuration for string messages

The parentMsg typically transform a Nats.Msg into the host application top-level
message.

    type Msg =
        NatsMsg (Nats.Msg Msg)
        | ...

    natsConfig =
        Nats.Config.init NatsMsg {}
values.type: (Nats.Msg String.String msg -> msg) -> Nats.PortsAPI.Ports String.String (Nats.Msg String.String msg) -> Nats.Config String.String String.String msg

values.name: withDebug
values.comment: Enable debug
values.type: Basics.Bool -> Nats.Config datatype portdatatype msg -> Nats.Config datatype portdatatype msg

name: Nats.Effect

values.name: batch
values.comment: Batch several nats effect, pretty much like Cmd.batch
values.type: List.List (Nats.Effect datatype msg) -> Nats.Effect datatype msg

values.name: map
values.comment: Transform the messages produced by an effect
values.type: (a -> b) -> Nats.Effect datatype a -> Nats.Effect datatype b

values.name: none
values.comment: Tell nats there are no effect
values.type: Nats.Effect datatype msg

values.name: onSocket
values.comment: Set / change the socket on which the effect should apply
values.type: String.String -> Nats.Effect datatype msg -> Nats.Effect datatype msg

values.name: setRequestMarker
values.comment: if the effect is a single request, set its marker to the given one
values.type: String.String -> Nats.Effect datatype msg -> Nats.Effect datatype msg

aliases.name: Timeout
aliases.comment:
A timeout error. The value is the time at which the timeout
was triggered

unions.name: SocketEvent
unions.comment: Event send during a socket lifecycle
cases: { sid : String.String, id : String.String, marker : Maybe.Maybe String.String, subject : String.String, inbox : String.String }

name: Nats.PortsAPI

aliases.name: Command
aliases.comment: A command for the js side

aliases.name: Event
aliases.comment: An event from the js side

aliases.name: Ports
aliases.comment: This is the API that the ports module must implement.
aliases.type: { send : Nats.PortsAPI.Send datatype msg, receive : Nats.PortsAPI.Receive datatype msg }

aliases.name: Receive
aliases.comment: the port signature for receiving events from the js side

aliases.name: Send
aliases.comment: the port signature for sending commands to the js side

name: Nats.Protocol

unions.name: Operation
unions.comment:
Typed operations of the NATS protocol

Here is the protocol documentation:

    CONNECT Client Sent to server to specify connection information
    PUB Client Publish a message to a subject, with optional reply subject
    SUB Client Subscribe to a subject (or subject wildcard)
    UNSUB Client Unsubscribe (or auto-unsubscribe) from subject
    MSG Server Delivers a message payload to a subscriber
    PING Both PING keep-alive message
    PONG Both PONG keep-alive response
    +OK Server Acknowledges well-formed protocol message in verbose mode
    -ERR Server Indicates a protocol error. Will cause client disconnect.

unions.name: ParseState
unions.comment: A temporary state when a parsing an operation is incomplete

aliases.name: ConnectOptions
aliases.type: { verbose : Basics.Bool, pedantic : Basics.Bool, auth_token : Maybe.Maybe String.String, user : Maybe.Maybe String.String, pass : Maybe.Maybe String.String, name : Maybe.Maybe String.String, lang : String.String, version : String.String, protocol : Basics.Int }

aliases.name: Message
aliases.type: { subject : String.String, replyTo : String.String, size : Basics.Int, data : datatype }

aliases.name: ParseResult
aliases.comment: The result of parsing an operation
aliases.type: Result.Result String.String ( List.List (Nats.Protocol.Operation datatype), Nats.Protocol.ParseState datatype )

aliases.name: ServerInfo
aliases.comment: Information sent by the server immediately after opening the connection
aliases.type: { server_id : String.String, version : String.String, go : String.String, host : String.String, port_ : Basics.Int, auth_required : Basics.Bool, max_payload : Basics.Int }

values.name: initialParseState
values.comment: Returns a initial ParseState
values.type: Nats.Protocol.ParseState datatype

values.name: parseBytes
values.comment:
Parse an operation from binary data.

Any message contained will be of type 'Bytes'
values.type: Nats.Protocol.ParseState Bytes.Bytes -> Bytes.Bytes -> Nats.Protocol.ParseResult Bytes.Bytes

values.name: parseString
values.comment:
Parse an operation (generally received from the server) from a string

Any message contained will be of type 'String'
values.type: Nats.Protocol.ParseState String.String -> String.String -> Nats.Protocol.ParseResult String.String

values.name: toBytes
values.comment: serialize to Bytes
values.type: Nats.Protocol.Operation Bytes.Bytes -> Bytes.Bytes

values.name: toString
values.comment:
serialize an Operation (generally for sending to the server)

if the operation contains data as bytes, the result string will be base64 encoded
values.type: Nats.Protocol.Operation String.String -> String.String

name: Nats.Socket

aliases.name: Socket
aliases.comment: Representation of a Nats connection properties

values.name: connectOptions
values.comment:
Build the smallest ConnectOptions possible

You generally want to combine it with 'withUserPass' or 'withAuthToken'
values.type: String.String -> String.String -> Nats.Protocol.ConnectOptions

values.name: new
values.comment:
Initialize a Socket with a unique ID and a endpoint url

The 'sid' can be used in various places of the API to choose which socket
should handle an effect or a subscription.
values.type: String.String -> String.String -> Nats.Socket.Socket

values.name: setDefault
values.comment:
Set this socket as the default one

If an app has several opened sockets, one must be the default one. By default,
the default socket is the first to be opened. This function can be used to
designate an arbitrary socket as the default one.

If several sockets have this flag, one of them will be picked
values.type: Nats.Socket.Socket -> Nats.Socket.Socket

values.name: withAuthToken
values.comment: Authenticate with a auth token
values.type: String.String -> Nats.Protocol.ConnectOptions -> Nats.Protocol.ConnectOptions

values.name: withDebug
values.comment:
Enable/disable debug mode on the socket

If the Config debug is on, all sockets will have debug enabled no matter what
value is given to this function.
values.type: Basics.Bool -> Nats.Socket.Socket -> Nats.Socket.Socket

values.name: withUserPass
values.comment: Authenticate with a username and a password
values.type: String.String -> String.String -> Nats.Protocol.ConnectOptions -> Nats.Protocol.ConnectOptions

name: Nats.Sub

values.name: batch
values.comment: Batch several subscriptions
values.type: List.List (Nats.Sub datatype msg) -> Nats.Sub datatype msg

values.name: map
values.comment: Map a Sub a to a Sub msg
values.type: (a -> msg) -> Nats.Sub datatype a -> Nats.Sub datatype msg

values.name: none
values.comment: An null subscription
values.type: Nats.Sub datatype msg

values.name: socket
values.comment: Set a different socket id on the subscription
values.type: String.String -> Nats.Sub datatype msg -> Nats.Sub datatype msg
